As a member of PANDORA Club you have access to a wealth of features and privileges via Facebook and iPhone. You can browse our online catalogue while you’re on the move or design absolute must-haves with our Bracelet designer. If you let us know what media and apps you are using, we can keep you informed on all your PANDORA opportunities.
